sections.title: Revolutionize Your Running with WhatsApp Coaching
sections.description: Experience the future of running coaching right on your phone. Our AI-powered WhatsApp coach delivers personalized training plans, real-time feedback, and motivation to runners of all levels. From couch to 5K or marathon PR, we're here to guide you every step of the way.

sections.title: Your Personal Running Coach on WhatsApp
sections.description: Get personalized running plans, real-time feedback, and motivation right in your WhatsApp. Our AI-powered coach adapts to your goals and schedule, helping you achieve your running dreams.

sections.title: Latest Running Tips and Insights
sections.description: Stay updated with the latest running advice, training techniques, and success stories from our WhatsApp Running Coach community.

posts.title: 5 Essential Stretches for Runners
posts.author: Coach Anitej
posts.excerpt: Discover the key stretches that every runner should incorporate into their routine to prevent injuries and improve performance.

posts.title: Nutrition Guide for Marathon Training
posts.author: Coach Alex
posts.excerpt: Learn about the best foods to fuel your long runs and how to maintain proper nutrition throughout your marathon training.

posts.title: Success Story: From Couch to 5K with WhatsApp Coaching
posts.author: Sarah J.
posts.excerpt: Read how Sarah transformed from a sedentary lifestyle to completing her first 5K race with the help of our WhatsApp Running Coach.

content.description: Coach's WhatsApp program has transformed my running journey. The personalized plans and constant support have helped me achieve my marathon goals!

sections.title: Frequently Asked Questions
sections.description: Get answers to common questions about our WhatsApp Running Coach service

questions.title: How does the WhatsApp Running Coach work?
questions.answer: Our WhatsApp Running Coach uses AI technology to provide personalized training plans, real-time feedback, and motivation directly through WhatsApp. Simply chat with the coach as you would with a human trainer.

questions.title: Is this service suitable for beginners?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Our AI coach adapts to all fitness levels, from beginners to advanced runners. It creates customized plans based on your current fitness level and goals.

questions.title: How often will I receive messages from the coach?
questions.answer: You can customize the frequency of messages. Typically, users receive daily training reminders, weekly progress updates, and real-time feedback during runs.

questions.title: Can I use this service if I'm training for a specific event?
questions.answer: Yes! Whether you're training for a 5K, marathon, or just improving your overall fitness, our AI coach can tailor a plan to your specific goals and timeline.

questions.title: How does the coach track my progress?
questions.answer: The coach integrates with popular fitness tracking apps and devices. You can also manually input your run data directly through WhatsApp for the AI to analyze and provide feedback.
